name: WOT Services Oy
tag_list: wot, mywot, web-of-trust, free-internet-security, online-security, firefox-addon, ie-addon
overview:
WOT Services Ltd. provides unique community-powered tools that boost trust on the Web.

Web of Trust (WOT) is the leading community-based safe surfing tool that uses an intuitive traffic-light rating system to help web users stay safe as they search, surf and shop online. Web site ratings are powered by a fast growing worldwide community of 26 million users who have rated the reputation of 33 million websites based on their experiences in terms of trustworthiness, vendor reliability, privacy and child safety. The WOT add-on shows reputation ratings on search engine results, shortened URLs and next to links in social networking sites Facebook and Twitter.

WOT works with Firefox, Google Chrome, Internet Explorer, Safari and Opera. The WOT add-on is a 100% free download.

WOTâ€™s crowd-sourced reputation data is licensed by search engines, social networks, anti-porn filters, school systems and local law enforcement to help keep Internet users safe from risky sites.

WOT Trust Seals can be purchased by owners of sites with excellent or good reputations as a marketing tool to show site visitors that they are a trusted site and thus differentiate from competition, attract new visitors and boost sales by increasing confidence and trust.

WOT is a start-up company incorporated in 2006 with investment from sources such as MySQL founder Michael Wideniusâ€™ investment company Open Ocean, Finnish Industry Investment Ltd. and private investors. The company focuses on developing and providing unique community-powered tools that boost trust on the Web.
